claim: Flublok is produced using a novel production platform in which recombinant HA is expressed in insect cells using a baculovirus expression vector system (BEVS).
explanation: A journal cover/header displaying the Elsevier logo, a ScienceDirect contents link, and the journal title ‘Vaccine’ with its homepage URL. does not support the claim because the figure is only a journal title header and contains no information on Flublok production methods or BEVS.

detailed_analysis.image_description: A journal cover/header displaying the Elsevier logo, a ScienceDirect contents link, and the journal title ‘Vaccine’ with its homepage URL.
